overview: The film is about a young biker who uncontrollably dreams of getting back into the saddle of his steel horse. On May 28, 2011, Boris Vishnyakov was involved in an accident in which he lost his eyesight. Doctors do not give comforting forecasts for the young man, but nevertheless, Boris wants to get back on the road again. How long the path of return will be, he and we have yet to find out.
title: I Will Definitely be Back
